translation.Visioon: Kamur Finance OÜ stands for easy and remote accounting which includes daily paperless recording. Sometimes starting your own first micro enterprise seems to aquire so much effort, especially when there is no previous experience with accounting. Write us and we will take care all the annoying tasks while you can create something good!
translation.AccountingTitle: Choose hourly accounting or make your own packet:
translation.choice3: Up to 10 purchase invoices per month (EE)
translation.choice5: Up to 5 sales invoices per month
